response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to propose an offer to make it more accessible to you. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $1,350,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring that you receive a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I believe this offer presents a favorable opportunity for both parties. Please let me know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 1350000}
